Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1200000. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am pleased to extend a special offer to you. For a limited time only, you can secure this remarkable item for $950000. This represents an exceptional saving compared to its full value and is a unique chance to own something truly exceptional. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
